item.title: Need help finding out the casses
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

It’s using a switch statement, but by the looks of it, that is the clicking most buttons packet. The case would be the actionbutton id.

item.title: Need help finding out the casses
item.dc:creator: @CarScape CarScape
item.description:
@CarScape wrote:

I made this Topic
to ask about how to get case for a something because i need all cases when do like options
In Npcdialog
-Select option-
OP1 - CASE TELEPORT
op2 CASE TELEPORT
OP3 - CASE TELEPORT
OP4 - CASE TELEPORT

ex: [code]
case 9167:
triggerTele(3087, 3516,0);
break;

	case 9168:
			triggerTele(3288, 3886,0);
	break;
	case 9169:
			triggerTele(3244, 3515,0);
	break;
		case 51031:
	sendFrame171(1, 2465);
	sendFrame171(0, 2468);
	sendFrame126("Pick a location", 2470);
	sendFrame126("Edge", 2471);
	sendFrame126("Wild Ruins", 2472);
	sendFrame126("Varrock", 2473);
	sendFrame164(2469);
			break;

[/code] found that by accident i want THe cases for

		sendFrame171(1, 8215);
		sendFrame171(0, 8218);
		sendFrame126("Pick a location", 8220);
		sendFrame126("OP1", 8221);
		sendFrame126("OP2", 8222);
		sendFrame126("OP3", 8223);
		sendFrame126("Op4", 8224);
		sendFrame164(8219);

Thanks,
-Anan
wat is the casses for those

Read full topic
